title: Billions - Radio Drama
description:
1 x 45 mins

Set in the near future, Mark's wife Donna is involved in an accident and lies in a coma in hospital. Mark reluctantly returns home after seeing Donna, only to find her next morning in the kitchen, cooking breakfast and packing their daughter off to school. Only it is not Donna, rather a perfect replica, with all her thoughts and feelings.

Which is the real Donna and what will happen if Donna recovers?
